module.name: Sangoma MCU
module.description: Modules to setup and manage Sangoma MCU
module.changelog: *13.0.5* Add sound languages: it,fr,en_GB *13.0.4* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Updates 2.11.0.3 Fixes issue with multiple MCUs being setup via the module 2.11.0.0 Initial Mockup
